3: She has been through countless cycles, rewound the river of time, and drifted in a sea of mortal coils.
She has seen too many flattering smiles and crying faces. She has felt too many attitudes, passionate or indifferent.
She has walked into a magnificent palace and a beautiful garden and been to an artificial fountain that emits a delightful fragrance.
She has witnessed how people give up on cultivating dry lands, how debris is scattered on the streets, and how gravestones appear everywhere around the world. The horizon is dark.
The dragon's wings cast a shadow on the ground.
So, she starts playing with her pipe.
Souls start floating. She cuts through the shadow with her singing voice. The physical body is ravaged and broken.
She has many clones, and they are all suffering.
She is not aware of how much time has passed.
The negative voices have left her. Malice and misunderstandings don't mean anything anymore. She hears everyone's thoughts and sees her own wish.
She sees farmlands overgrown with grains and grassy hillsides where sheep roam.
She sees plains covered in green grass and river banks where cowslips and pampas grass grew.
She sees waves washing against the seashore and rainbows after a storm.
She sees all the magnificent and romantic views this world has to offer.
It is peaceful and full of life.
The world without an evil dragon. The world without her.
